title: "quarkus.platform.group-id" isn't generated properly in Quarkus 2.13.3.Final via Quarkus CLI
body:
### Describe the bug

When I created a new quarkus project via Quarkus CLI (e.g. , quarkus create kube-native-java) "quarkus.platform.group-id" property is generated as below:

<quarkus.platform.group-id>io.quarkus.platform</quarkus.platform.group-id>

Then, Quarkus dev mode via "quarkus dev" failed to start.

The property should be <quarkus.platform.group-id>io.quarkus</quarkus.platform.group-id> without "**.platform**"

### Expected behavior

Quarkus dev mode starts without errors.

### Actual behavior

```
âžœ  kube-native-java quarkus dev
[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[WARNING] The POM for io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:jar:2.13.3.Final is missing, no dependency information available
[ERROR] [ERROR] Some problems were encountered while processing the POMs:
[ERROR] Unresolveable build extension: Plugin io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.13.3.Final or one of its dependencies could not be resolved: io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:jar:2.13.3.Final was not found in https://maven.repository.redhat.com/ga/ during a previous attempt. This failure was cached in the local repository and resolution is not reattempted until the update interval of jboss-enterprise-maven-repository-ga has elapsed or updates are forced @ 
 @ 
[ERROR] The build could not read 1 project -> [Help 1]
[ERROR]   
[ERROR]   The project org.acme:kube-native-java:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT (/Users/danieloh/Downloads/conferences/kubecon-na-22/rh-pod/kube-native-java/pom.xml) has 1 error
[ERROR]     Unresolveable build extension: Plugin io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.13.3.Final or one of its dependencies could not be resolved: io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:jar:2.13.3.Final was not found in https://maven.repository.redhat.com/ga/ during a previous attempt. This failure was cached in the local repository and resolution is not reattempted until the update interval of jboss-enterprise-maven-repository-ga has elapsed or updates are forced -> [Help 2]
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch.
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/ProjectBuildingException
[ERROR] [Help 2] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/PluginManagerException

```

### How to Reproduce?

1. quarkus create kube-native-java
2. cd kube-native-java
3. quarkus dev

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin Daniels-MacBook-Pro 21.6.0 Darwin Kernel Version 21.6.0: Mon Aug 22 20:17:10 PDT 2022; root:xnu-8020.140.49~2/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.10" 2021-01-19 OpenJDK Runtime Environment AdoptOpenJDK (build 11.0.10+9) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM AdoptOpenJDK (build 11.0.10+9, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.13.3.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.6

### Additional information

_No response_
